document.full_text: need to find a certain open window on your desktop - but you cannot fully see it in the clutter of other open windows on the screen? both windows 7 and mac os x include features that help you focus quickly on the one window you need.
document.title: tip of the week: seeing the forest for the windows
lines_and_colors: need to find a certain open window on your desktop - but you cannot fully see it in the clutter of other open windows on the screen? both windows 7 and mac os x include features that help you focus quickly on the one window you need.
